Html:
Hi All,

I am trying to intergrate the 'Windows Ribbon for WinForms' control in the user control.

Currently it is throwing exception at
// Connects the framework and the application
    [PreserveSig]
    HRESULT Initialize(IntPtr frameWnd, IUIApplication application);
Can any one help me by telling the COM API that need to be used to connect the framework & custom control?
